SEARCH
Package cesur.accesodatos.file

Interface Menu

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileDAO
public interface Menu
User interaction interface. This interface is meant to manage all possible user interactions for IDAO interface methods. All methods are called like IDAO's methods with the 'execute' prefix and call the corresponding one inside them.

  • Method Details

    • executeMenu

      void executeMenu()
      Method to launch a menu and read user input. Based on a series of possible options, the corresponding method will be called or an error message will be displayed on terminal.

    • executeFindAllEmployees

      void executeFindAllEmployees()
      Method to display a table with all Employees stored. This method displays all Employees information in a table view from a list that is returned by IDAO's corresponding method, that will be called inside. If the returned list is empty, a message notifying it will be shown.

    • executeFindEmployeeByID

      void executeFindEmployeeByID()
      Method to display an Employee found by its ID. This method asks the user for a numeric ID and execute the corresponding IDAO's method. If an Employee is found, the toString() method is displayed, if not an error will be shown.

    • executeAddEmployee

      void executeAddEmployee()
      Method to add new Employee. This method asks the user for all required information to create a new Employee. If any input from user is not good, an error will be displayed and the method execution stops. If all inputs from user are good (all data is valid), the corresponding IDAO's method will be executed.

    • executeUpdateEmployee

      void executeUpdateEmployee()
      Method to update an existing Employee. This method asks the user for a numeric ID, checks if there is an existing Employee with that ID and if so, executes the corresponding IDAO's method. If there is no Employee with the ID, an error will be shown.

    • executeDeleteEmployee

      void executeDeleteEmployee()
      Method to delete an existing Employee. This method asks for a numeric ID, checks if there is an existing Employee with that ID and if so, executes the corresponding IDAO's method. If there is no Employee with the ID, an error will be shown.

    • executeFindAllDepartments

      void executeFindAllDepartments()
      Method to display a table with all Departments stored. This method displays all Departments information in a table view from a list that is returned by IDAO's corresponding method, that will be called inside. If the returned list is empty, a message notifying it will be shown.

    • executeFindDepartmentByID

      void executeFindDepartmentByID()
      Method to display a Department found by its ID. This method asks the user for a numeric ID and execute the corresponding IDAO's method. If a Department is found, the toString() method is displayed, if not an error will be shown.

    • executeAddDepartment

      void executeAddDepartment()
      Method to add new Department. This method asks the user for all required information to create a new Department. If any input from user is not good, an error will be displayed and the method execution stops. If all inputs from user are good (all data is valid), the corresponding IDAO's method will be executed.

    • executeUpdateDepartment

      void executeUpdateDepartment()
      Method to update an existing Department. This method asks the user for a numeric ID, checks if there is an existing Department with that ID and if so, executes the corresponding IDAO's method. If there is no Department with the ID, an error will be shown.

    • executeDeleteDepartment

      void executeDeleteDepartment()
      Method to delete an existing Department. This method asks for a numeric ID, checks if there is an existing Department with that ID and if so, executes the corresponding IDAO's method. If there is no Department with the ID, an error will be shown.

    • executeFindEmployeesByDept

      void executeFindEmployeesByDept()
      Method to display a table with all Employees from a Department stored. This method lists all Employees that belong to a Department in a table view from a list that is returned by IDAO's corresponding method, that will be called inside. If the returned list is empty, a message notifying it will be shown.
